name: wamr-fast-jit
install-command: git clone https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-micro-runtime.git --depth 1 wamr-fast-jit && cd wamr-fast-jit/product-mini/platforms/$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. -DWAMR_BUILD_FAST_JIT=1 && make && mkdir -p ../../../../bin && cp iwasm ../../../../bin/iwasm
desc: WebAssembly Micro Runtime (WAMR) built with Fast JIT, a lightweight JIT engine with quick startup
update-command: cd wamr-fast-jit && git pull && rm -rf bin && cd product-mini/platforms/$(uname -s | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. -DWAMR_BUILD_FAST_JIT=1 && make && mkdir -p ../../../../bin && cp iwasm ../../../../bin/iwasm
